template.content:
<#--
	Relocate Submit Button Plugin
	Author: Pavel Valetka <pvaletka@workfusion.com>
	Version: 0.2
-->
<style type="text/css">
.hit-submit-btn{
	display: inline;
	float: right;
	margin: -6px -10px 4px 10px;
}

.hit-submit-btn > .submit-btn{
	margin: 0;
	padding: 4px 20px !important;
}

</style>
<script type="text/javascript">
	$(function(){
		$(".hit-submit-btn").appendTo("div.answer-label-cnt");
	})
</script>
template.name: ie/plugins/ie-relocate-submit.plugin
